did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: Nevin Scrimshaw papers, 1950-1985.
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Includes correspondence, publications, reports, professional writings, and notes concerning Scrimshaw's work in international nutrition and public health and with the World Health Organization,and the United Nations. Also his study of public health issues in Asia, Africa, Central America, and the United States.

bioghist.head: BIOGRAPHICAL NOTE
bioghist.p: Professor of Nutrition, MIT. Dr. Scrimshaw did his undergraduate work at Ohio Wesleyan University and received an M.A. in biology and a Ph.D. in physiology from Harvard in 1941. He attended the University of Rochester medical school and received his M.D. in 1945.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Includes correspondence, publications, reports, professional writings, and notes concerning Scrimshaw's work in international nutrition and public health and with the World Health Organization,and the United Nations. Also his study of public health issues in Asia, Africa, Central America, and the United States.
Includes articles, reports and memos concerning breastfeeding.

controlaccess.head: Names:
controlaccess.corpname: Institute of Medicine (U.S.).Food and Nutrition Board.
Institute of Nutrition of Central America and Panama.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Nevin Scrimshaw papers, #6563. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.

arrangement.head: SERIES LIST
arrangement.p:
Series I. Nutrition Programs and PAG
Boxes 1-8

Series II. Personal Papers, Projects, and Correspondence
Boxes 9-14

Series III. International Organizations and Committees
Boxes 15-30

did.unittitle: Series I: Nutrition Programs and PAG
World Health Organization (WHO) nutrition program, U.S. food aid policies, Pakistan, Peru, Food for Peace Program
Protein Isolates, Nutrition and Refugee Populations, intestinal diseases and parastic infections, infant and child nutrition, Arusha (Pakistan)
Protein Advisory Group (PAG)
Series II: Personal Papers, Projects, and Correspondence
World Hunger Program, NAS world food and nutrition study, Bangladesh refugees
USDA, aid to India, U.N., correspondence
Mekong, soybean, corn, Agriculture and green revolution, Soya products, Sorghum, alternative protein sources
Health policy and planning, correspondence, nutrition and mental development
Correspondence, lecture notes, notes from the Philippines, photographs
Nutritional Development papers, South Africa, correspondence
Series III: International Organizations and Committees
National Academy of Sciences (NAS)-committee on International Health: minutes and reports
NAS and World Health Organization (WHO) regarding Africa, U.N. General Assembly, U.N. Research Institute for social development, U.N. Industrial Development Organization, correspondence
Food and Nutrition Board (FNB): committee meetings, programs, studies
FNB: committee on International Nutrition Programs, Directories, WHO: advisory committees on medical research
WHO: tropical diseases, committee papers and reports
WHO: Nutrition Intervention Evaluation Project; Country files: Brazil, China, Colombia, India, Indonesia, North Vietnam, Pakistan, South Vietnam, "Foundations for a New U.S. Health Policy"
Food and Agriculture Organization of the U.N. (FAO) and WHO research projects, reports, conference papers
FAO, lecture notes, FAO/WHO Committee on Nutrition: session notes and statistics
U.N., joint FAO/WHO Committee on Protein requirements, FAO/WHO/United Nations University (UNU) conference 1981, UNICEF/WHO committee on Health Policy, other U.N. organizations
U.N., Subcommittee on Nutrition, UNU, U.N. Economic and Social council, UNESCO, World Food Council, Protein Advisory Group (PAG), reports and agendas, notes
UN/ACC Subcommittee on Nutrition: 6th-8th, 12th-14th session notes, UNU reports and papers
UN/ACC Subcommittee on Nutrition; site visits: Philippines, West Indies, India and Europe, Moscow, Costa Rica and Colombia; World Food Council: Ministerial Sessions
US/Japan Coop Program: annual and five year reports, Malnutrition Panel meetings, Malnutrition Special Study Sections
US/Japan Coop Program: Malnutrition Panel meetings, correspondence, progress reports, joint malnutrition panel meetings
US/Japan Coop Program: Malnutrition Panel meetings, correspondence and notes, cooperative medical science program
Series IV: Articles
Breastfeeding articles and reports from around the world
